origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'InsuranceAPI.get_company_sustainability_data', 'description': 'This function provides historical or current sustainability data for a specific insurance company.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'companyName', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the insurance company.'}, {'name': 'dataCategory', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The category of sustainability data, e.g., historical, current.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'data', 'description': 'The sustainability data for the specified company.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 InsuranceAPI.get_company_sustainability_data, 它的参数输入如下: 'companyName'是'China_PingAn', 'dataCategory'是'historical'.
